text: David Alan "Dave" Coulier (born September 21, 1959) is an American actor, voice actor, comedian, and television host. He became known in the late 1980s and the early 1990s for playing Joey Gladstone on the ABC sitcom Full House. In October 2024, Coulier was diagnosed with stage 3 non-Hodgkin lymphoma, and began chemotherapy. ==References== ==Other websites== * *cleanguys.TV *"Getting Out of Control" * The Same Picture of David Coulier Every Day Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Michigan Category:Comedians from Michigan
title: Dave Coulier
